thread.title: BRIEF-Kingsmen Creatives Announce Licensing Agreement With Hasbro To Build And Operate Nerf Entertainment Centers

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kingsmen Creatives Announce Licensing Agreement With Hasbro To Build And Operate Nerf Entertainment Centers

organizations.name: hasbro to build and operate nerf entertainment centers feb

text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Kingsmen Creatives Ltd:
* ‍KINGSMEN AND HASBRO ANNOUNCE PLANS TO OPEN NERF FAMILY ENTERTAINMENT CENTER ATTRACTIONS​
* ENTERED INTO A LICENSING AGREEMENT WITH HASBRO TO BUILD AND OPERATE NERF ENTERTAINMENT CENTERS ACROSS ASIA PACIFIC Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
